hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“We were with the Prophet (ﷺ), and we were in Ihram. When a rider met us we would lower our garments from the top of our heads, and when he has gone, we would lift them up again.” Another chain reports a similar hadith

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُحْرِمَةِ تَسْدِلُ الثَّوْبَ عَلَى وَجْهِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The female Muhrim may lower her garment over her face
